title: Jim Gaffigan Returns
description:
Comedian Jim Gaffigan feels ecstatic about being Conan O’Brien’s friend.


 

Jim returns to the show to sit down once again with Conan to discuss very American opinions, Conan’s worst guest ever, holiday traditions, and his new special Jim Gaffigan: Comedy Monster. Later, Conan comes to grips with his terrible taste in Christmas decorations.


 

Got a question for Conan? Call our voicemail: (323) 451-2821.


 

For Conan videos, tour dates and more visit TeamCoco.com.
author: conaf@teamcoco.com (Team Coco & Earwolf)
